[quote=“JAVA OWNS C++, post:2, topic:140901”]if (npcs[i].npcType == 821) { // White Knight - White Owner if (misc.random2(30) == 0) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "@@ ."; } else if (misc.random(30) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "@@"; } }
voila[/quote]

Thanks dude you help alot, but i was pretty close i guess :rolleyes:

item.description:
@Ii_1337_iI wrote:

Can some one help me, I’m trying to make it so an NPC will say more than one thing… I think it would be something like this

[code]}
if (npcs[i].npcType == 821) { // White Knight - White Owner
if (misc.random2(30) == 1) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = “@@ .”;
{
else
}
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = “@@”;

					} [/code]

But i Dont know im just guessing its probly wrong, but if someone can help please do.
